mapper.select: select id, code, type, name, description, pid, url, menu_type, state, keystr, routing, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_permission where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_permission(code, type, name, description, pid, url, menu_type, state, keystr, routing, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{code}, #{type}, #{name}, #{description}, #{pid}, #{url}, #{menuType}, #{state}, #{keystr}, #{routing}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})

insert into sys_permission(code, type, name, description, pid, url, menu_type, state, keystr, routing, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.code}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.pid}, #{entity.url}, #{entity.menuType}, #{entity.state}, #{entity.keystr}, #{entity.routing}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into sys_permission(code, type, name, description, pid, url, menu_type, state, keystr, routing, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.code}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.pid}, #{entity.url}, #{entity.menuType}, #{entity.state}, #{entity.keystr}, #{entity.routing}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update code = values(code), type = values(type), name = values(name), description = values(description), pid = values(pid), url = values(url), menu_type = values(menu_type), state = values(state), keystr = values(keystr), routing = values(routing), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update sys_permission
code = #{code},
type = #{type},
name = #{name},
description = #{description},
pid = #{pid},
url = #{url},
menu_type = #{menuType},
state = #{state},
keystr = #{keystr},
routing = #{routing},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
